cocktail noun
(MIXTURE)
[ C usually singular ] a mixture of different things, often an unexpected, dangerous, or exciting one: The inquest heard that the guitarist died from a cocktail of drink and drugs. Cars produce a lethal cocktail of gasses.

Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a drink made by mixing two or more drinks together: Would you like a cocktail?
[ C ] A cocktail is also a mixture of different things: The cocktail of drugs to treat TB is taken for six to nine months.
cocktail noun
(FOOD)
[ C/U ] a small dish of particular foods sometimes eaten at the beginning of a meal: [ C ] I’d like the shrimp cocktail, please.
